description:
Create a Diamond pattern made of '#' character where the number of columns are half of that of number of rows. You are given an integer 'n' representing the number of rows for the Diamond pattern to be created. Sample Input: 3 Sample Output:      #
    # #
  # # #
  # # #
    # #
      #
Constraints: 1 <= n <= 20
title: Diamond Pattern
